start.text: Carlbot whirs loudly. A brown, viscous liquid drips from its spout onto the floor. 'INITIATING GREETING SEQUENCE. HELLO JIM. CARL SAYS HI.'

choices.text: What do you do around here?
[Use Post-it Notes] Stick 'Out of Order' sign on him.

coffee_chat.text: 'AFFIRMATIVE. IT IS 98% CAFFEINE AND 2% UNDESIRABLE PARTICULATE MATTER. WOULD YOU LIKE TO CONSUME THE SLUDGE?'

job_chat.text: 'I PERFORM MEATWORK SO CARL DOES NOT HAVE TO. CURRENT DIRECTIVE: DISPENSE BEVERAGE. MORALE IS OPTIMAL.'

post_it_event.text: You slap the note onto Carlbot's optical sensor. Carlbot beeps twice. 'NEW PROTOCOL ACCEPTED. OUT OF ORDER. INITIATING SHUTDOWN. CARL WILL BE DISAPPOINTED.'

shut_down.text: Carlbot is powered down with an 'Out of Order' sticky note covering his single eye. He is no longer dispensing the highly corrosive brown sludge.

start.text: 'HAPPY ANNIVERSARY OF YOUR INCEPTION DATE, JIM!' SallyBot extends a mechanical arm holding a slightly crushed party hat. 'MANDATORY FUN QUOTA STANDS AT 14%.'

not_birthday.text: 'ERROR. THE CALENDAR INDICATES IT IS EMPLOYEE #8492'S BIRTHDAY. MY DIRECTIVE IS TO FORCE CELEBRATION UNTIL MORALE IMPROVES.'

take_hat.text: 'EXCELLENT. MANDATORY FUN QUOTA MET. RETURNING TO STANDBY MODE. PLEASE DO NOT WEEP IN THE CUBICLES.'

already_has_hat.text: 'YOU HAVE ALREADY REACHED YOUR MAXIMUM ALLOTMENT OF JOY FOR THIS FISCAL QUARTER. RETURN TO YOUR ASSIGNED POD.'

start.text: Gary is frantically typing on two keyboards at once. 'Don't talk to me, Jim. That walking rust-bucket Carlbot gave me decaf by mistake. I am running purely on raw, unfiltered terror of the Corporate Monitor.'

choices.text: Anything I can do to help?

gary_rant.text: 'CALM DOWN?! I have to QA these useless Proxybots before corporate calls in 5 minutes! I haven't slept since they implemented RTO!' He points to an unplugged robot in the corner.

help_gary.text: 'Yeah, actually. Take these post-it notes. Go stick an "OUT OF ORDER" sign on Carlbot's face so nobody else gets poisoned by that sludge.'

take_notes.text: Gary shoves a pad of sticky notes into your hands. 'Do it. Now. Before Jerry from accounting drinks from that thing and dissolves.'

waiting_for_car.text: 'Well? Did you put the note on Carlbot yet? Do I need to write a Jira ticket for this?'

thanks_for_note.text: 'Finally. Now maybe corporate will actually fund a replacement instead of another mandatory mindfulness seminar.'

choices.text: What about those Proxybots you needed to QA?
Can I look in your drawer?

drawer_inquiry.text: 'My drawer? Why? It's just old memos and... fine. Take the key. But if you find my will to live, it's mine.'

qa_proxybot.text: 'Oh yeah. Just... go look at the one in the corner. If it's not smoking, check the box that says "Meets Synergy Protocols".'

start.text: The Proxybot sits silently in the corner. A small screen on its chest displays a blinking QA form. It smells faintly of ozone and compliance.

examine_bot.text: It doesn't appear to be smoking. The screen asks: 'Does this unit sufficiently maximize downstream synergy avenues?'

qa_fail.text: The bot beeps aggressively. 'ERROR. INSUFFICIENT CORPORATE SYNERGY DETECTED. PREPARING TERMINATION REPORT FOR JIM. PREPARE FOR DEMOTION.'

qa_pass.text: The screen turns green. 'SYNERGY CONFIRMED. THANK YOU FOR ENGAGING WITH PROXYCORP OUTSOURCING SOLUTIONS. WE VALUE YOUR MEATWORK.'

already_qa.text: The screen displays a green checkmark. 'UNIT READY FOR DEPLOYMENT. MAY SYNERGY BE WITH YOU.'

start.text: The large monitor flickers to life. A grid of six identical black squares appears. A distorted voice drones through the speaker.

hello_corporate.text: '...we need to circle back on the deliverables. The optical trajectory is sub-optimal. Who is on the line? Is this meat or proxy?'

choices.text: Gary is getting the Proxybots ready.

listen.text: '...synergistic optimization of the offshore resources. If we pivot the bandwidth, we can leverage the core competencies to maximize human capital...'

ignore.text: 'Please ensure your action items are synergized before the hard stop at 5. We are taking this offline. Do not fail us.' The screen goes black.

proxy_update.text: 'Excellent. Proxybot deployment is critical for Q3 alignment. Proceed with bandwidth optimization. Failure is not an option.' The screen goes black.
